welcome: Welcome to the portal of CLOCK Work

validationRule.percentageTotal: Total percentage must equal 100%. Current total: {totalPercentage}%
validationRule.endDateAfterStart: End date must be after start date
validationRule.eosNumber: Must be in the format 'FXXXXXX' where 'X' is any digit from 0 to 9

acknowledgeGU.text: The development of this project was supported by {link}.

instruction.approver: You can request a change to the budget position of a petition to a supervisor. you can write your changes in the message box below.The supervisor will receive an email with your requested changes.
instruction.clerk: You can request a change of a petition to a student.You can select a subject in the dropdown menu and then write your changes in the message box below. The student will receive an email with your requested changes.
instruction.student: You can request a change of a petition to a supervisor. You can select a subject in the dropdown menu and then write your changes in the message box below. The supervisor will receive an email with your requested changes.
